business.headline: TCS Q4 Results: Profit falls 2% to Rs 12,224 crore, final dividend at Rs 30TCS ends FY25 with strong deal wins but earnings miss estimates, capping a tough year for the IT giant as macro headwinds and weak discretionary spending weigh on profit growth.

EPFO introduces face authentication for UAN generation. Know detailsNow, both employers and employees can generate a UAN by simply using facial recognition via the government's UMANG app. This is expected to solve common problems such as incorrect personal details or missing mobile numbers, which often delayed UAN generation.

Apple airlifts 600 tons of iPhones from India to dodge Trump's China tariffsThe devices were flown out of the Chennai airport in the southern state of Tamil Nadu, where Apple has been building up production through its manufacturing partners like Foxconn and Tata.

TCS Q4 results to be announced today: What to expect from the IT firm?Investors and market watchers are expecting a mixed performance from the IT major. Key focus areas include operating margins, revenue growth, deal wins, employee attrition, and management commentary on guidance for the year ahead.

Sanjeev Sanyal says tariff-hit NRI relatives calling to ask for paracetamol, iPhonesDonald Trump has hinted at imposing new tariffs on pharmaceuticals, a move that could raise costs for Indian pharmaceutical companies. This would make Indian-made generic drugs more expensive for both Americans and Indian consumers.

90 days, $500 billion, one big shot: India's trade gamble in Trump's tariff pauseThe pause in tariffs is seen in New Delhi as more than just goodwill; it's strategic. By sparing countries like India, the US appears to be isolating China in what is shaping up to be the most aggressive round of trade hostilities since the Covid-19 pandemic.

Explained: What US-China trade war means for India and the worldWith tariffs flying thick and fast, supply chains unravelling, and geopolitical tensions rising, India, like much of the world, finds itself watching, waiting, and bracing for impact.

Bitcoin jumps over 6% after Trump's 90-day tariff break; Ethereum, XRP rallyBitcoin, along with other major cryptos like Ethereum, XRP, Cardano, Solana, and Dogecoin, etc., are witnessing a surge in their prices post US President Donald Trump's announcement of a 90-day pause on new tariff hikes.

Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath on market crash: 'Investors may stay away for years'In 2008, the global market took a major hit with the collapse of Lehman Brothers, a global financial services firm and one of the largest investment banks in the US, causing a ripple effect around the world.

Should stock market investors take Donald Trump's 'buy' tip seriously?From aggressive tariffs on China to sudden pauses and vague reassurances, the whiplash is real and investors are feeling it. Markets bleed one day and bounce back the next, all thanks to a tweet or a policy pivot from the US President.

RBI is cutting key rates, but are banks passing them on?RBI announced a cut in the repo rate by 25 basis points, bringing it down to 6% on Wednesday. The decision was made after the central bank's Monetary Policy Committee (MPC), led by Governor Sanjay Malhotra, finished its three-day meeting which started on April 7.

China's Yuan falls to 17-year low after Trump tariffs kick inThe decline in Yuan comes as a trade war between the world's two largest economies escalates. US President Donald Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs on dozens of countries took effect on Wednesday, including massive 104% duties on Chinese goods.

Global markets jump as Donald Trump hits pause on tariffsGlobal markets rise: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq saw their biggest daily percentage rises in over 10 years, adding over $1.5 trillion in market value.

Mahavir Jayanti holiday: Are Sensex and Nifty open for trading today?Stock market holiday: According to the official stock market holiday list, Mahavir Jayanti is one of three holidays in April. The other two are on April 14 for Dr Baba Saheb Ambedkar Jayanti and April 18 for Good Friday.

World's biggest green cargo ship, MSC Turkiye docks at Adani's Vizhinjam PortMSC Turkiye: The vessel is 399.9 metres long, 61.3 metres wide, and has a depth of 33.5 metres. It has the capacity to carry 24,346 twenty-foot equivalent units (TEUs), making it one of the largest container ships ever built.

Wall Street surges as Trump hits pause on tariffs, Dow jumps over 2,300 pointsWall Street jumped after President Trump paused new tariffs for 90 days, easing trade worries. Big tech companies like Apple and Nvidia led the gains.
Sensex falls over 350 points, Nifty below 22,500; banking stocks downThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 379.73 points to close at 73,847.15, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 136.70 points to end at 22,399.15.
From Rajdhani to Vande Bharat: Investor criticises India's lag in train techWhen Rajdhani was launched in 1969, it placed India among Asia's fastest rail nations, second only to Japan.

RBI Governor says US tariff impact on growth bigger worry than inflationThe RBI's rate cut comes at a time when inflation appears to be under control, but economic growth faces risks from global uncertainty after US tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump.

RBI rate cut brings relief for borrowers, but banking stocks tumble. Here's whyBanking stocks, especially public sector lenders, took a sharp hit after the rate cut announcement. The Nifty Bank index was down nearly 1%, with major losers including Bank of Baroda, Canara Bank, Punjab National Bank, and SBI.

RBI monetary policy: 6 key takeaways from MPC meetingWith the repo rate cut, borrowing costs for home and personal loans are likely to fall. This would provide a big relief to the homebuyers and could boost the housing market.

RBI MPC meeting: 5 key development reforms you must knowCurrently, UPI payments are mostly capped at Rs 1 lakh for both P2P and P2M. The RBI has suggested that National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) may now review and revise these limits based on evolving user needs.

RBI cuts Repo Rate by 25 points to 6% amid global trade warThe Reserve Bank of India has cut the repo rate by 25 basis points to 6%, potentially leading to lower EMIs for home loans. The RBI has also lowered the GDP forecast for FY26 to 6.5% from the earlier 6.7%. The Monetary Policy Committee unanimously decided to change the stance from neutral to accommodative, hinting at possible further easing. The RBI Governor expressed concerns over global trade uncertainties and their potential impact on inflation and growth.

Cheaper home, auto loan EMIs after RBI rate cut. What it means for youRBI reduces key lending rate to 6%. Lower interest rates are expected to make borrowing cheaper, which can help people buy homes or vehicles more easily.

RBI changes stance from neutral to accommodative: What does it mean?The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Sanjay Malhotra has announced a cut in the repo rate by 25 basis points, bringing it down from 6.25% to 6%.

RBI downgrades 2025-26 GDP forecast to 6.5% from 6.7% amid global tariff warWhile sharing the new projections, Governor Sanjay Malhotra said the downward revision of the GDP forecast was mainly due to growing risks in global trade and policy developments.

Donald Trump's 26% reciprocal tariffs on India come into effectA 26% tariff on Indian exports to the USA has come into effect. Key sectors impacted include electronics, gems and jewellery, auto components, and agricultural products. The Union Cabinet is set to meet to discuss India's strategy and the impact on exporters. The Indian government is in touch with exporters to minimise the impact, while also working on a bilateral trade agreement with the US.

Home loans to get cheaper as RBI cuts key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6%RBI MPC meeting: This is the second rate cut in a row, following a 25 basis point reduction in February. RBI also changed its earlier stance from neutral to 'accommodative'.

Trump's 26% tariffs on India come into effect, big Cabinet meet todayWith markets in a free fall since Donald Trump's reciprocal tariff announcement, the Union Cabinet will hold a crucial meeting today to strategise on ways to minimise the impact.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as RBI policy and global cues weigh on investorsThe S&P BSE Sensex fell by 255.49 points to 73,971.59, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 86.70 points to 22,449.15 as of 9:22 am.

RBI MPC: Will home loans get cheaper after today's policy announcement?RBI MPC meeting: In its last meeting held in February, the RBI cut the repo rate by 25 basis points. This was the first rate cut under RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra, and also the first cut in nearly five years.

Stock market today: Will RBI MPC decision pause Sensex, Nifty rally?The Sensex and Nifty ended Tuesday's session with big gains, but a global sell-off and worries about trade tensions are expected to affect today's opening.

Stocks to watch on April 9: NTPC, Adani Wilmar, Vodafone Idea, BPCLIn today's trade, many shares will be in focus due to key news developments. These include NTPC, BPCL, Adani Wilmar, Vodafone Idea, Cyient, PNB Housing Finance, and more.

S&P 500 hits lowest level in one year as hopes for Trump tariff relief fadeThe S&P 500 reached its lowest level in nearly a year after it reversed a strong morning rally, as hopes faded for any concessions or delays on President Donald Trump's global tariffs on US's trading partners set to come into effect on April 9.

US markets gain sharply on hopes of tariff talks: Will Dalal Street continue rally?If Wall Street wraps up today's session on a strong note, it could deliver a big dose of confidence to investors worldwide, especially in Asian markets.

US markets rally as Dow Jones jumps 1,100 points, Nasdaq, S&P surge 3%The surge in US stocks came as investors looked for any indication that the US might be open to easing some of its tougher tariffs through negotiations.

Opting for new tax regime? Know about this Rs 7,000 post office savings benefitAs per a government notification issued back in 2011, interest from post office savings accounts is exempt under Section 10(15) of the Income Tax Act.

Sensex, Nifty end higher on global recovery and RBI rate cut expectationsThe S&P BSE Sensex added 1,089.18 points to close at 74,227.08, while the NSE Nifty5o gained 374.25 points to end at 22,535.85.

RBI MPC to announce decision on April 9: Will there be a rate cut?Since the last MPC meeting, held in February 2025, a lot of things have changed, both positive and negative. While inflation has come down, and growth has started to pick up, there are fresh worries about the global economy.

'Economic nuclear war': Billionaire business titans slam Trump's tariff gambitDonald Trump's tariff agenda is fracturing elite support, with top businessmen — from Bill Ackman to Jamie Dimon — warning it risks recession, inflation, and global instability.

entertainment.headline: Pedro Pascal's The Last of Us renewed for season threeThe hit series 'The Last of Us,' starring Pedro Pascal, is set for a third season even before its second season airs. The show's renewal underscores its massive popularity and success.

Jaat review: Sunny Deol's film is the mass masala blast we didn't know we neededReleased-Thu Apr 10, 2025Jaat movie review: Sunny Deol's 'Jaat' is an action-packed spectacle that captivates audiences with its high-octane drama and powerful performances, says our review.
Tabu joins Vijay Sethupathi and Puri Jagannadh's filmActor Tabu has been roped for Vijay Sethupathi and Puri Jagannadh's upcoming pan-India film. The untitled film was announced on Ugadi 2025.

Remo D'Souza developing ABCD sequel and a romantic filmChoreographer-turned-director Remi D'Souza is developing two projects -- a romantic film as well as ABCD's sequel. Other details are yet to be announced.

Bhool Chuk Maaf trailer: Rajkummar Rao is stuck in a hilarious time loop twistRajkummar Rao and Wamiqa Gabbi's Bhool Chuk Maaf trailer was released on April 10. The film will hit the big screens on May 9.
Saba Azad's cute nickname for Hrithik Roshan from US vacationHrithik Roshan and Saba Azad are enjoying vacation in the US. Saba shared mushy pictures from their exotic trip on social media.

Jack review: Siddhu Jonalagadda's not-so-smart spy film fails to impressReleased-Thu Apr 10, 2025Jack film review: Jack is a Telugu action comedy which stars Siddhu Jonalagadda, Vaishnavi Chaitanya, and Prakash Raj. Director Bommarilu Bhaskar's story falls flat, offering nothing but a sluggish screenplay with characters playing catch.

Diljit Dosanjh to make his Met Gala debut this year: SourcesPunjabi superstar Diljit Dosanjh is set to make his debut at the Met Gala, marking another milestone in his illustrious career. As an ambassador for Google Pixel, he is expected to bring his unique blend of tradition and contemporary style to the iconic fashion event.

Mammootty's Bazooka hits the mark, only if you make it to last 30 minutesReleased-Thu Apr 10, 2025Bazooka review: Mammootty delivers charisma in this digital-age thriller, blending forensic mystery, heists and gaming elements, though it struggles with pacing after a strong start.

Sunny Deol and the art of reinventing the angry man stereotypeSunny Deol is all set to bring back his signature same-same-but-somehow-different angry man energy in Gopichand Mallineni's Jaat. But seriously—how does he pull this off every single time? Why do audiences still root for him, cheer for him, and turn up in droves for characters that, on paper, feel almost identical? What is it about Sunny that keeps him so relevant, even when he's playing yet another rage-fuelled desi hero?

Jaat X reviews: Fans praise Sunny Deol's film, call him 'a total beast'Sunny Deol's latest film Jaat has captivated audiences with its thrilling action and strong performances. The film, featuring Randeep Hooda and directed by Gopichand Malineni, is already making waves.

From fanboy to co-star, Randeep Hooda on growing up watching Sunny DeolActor Randeep Hooda opened up about sharing screen space with Sunny Deol in the upcoming Jaat. Hooda said he grew up watching Deol's movies.

Kapil Sharma flaunts weight loss, fans ask if it is because of OzempicComedian Kapil Sharma shocked fans with his significant weight loss, drawing comparisons to Karan Johar's recent transformation. Several people also speculated that he might be using Ozempic.
Chhaava to Chhorii 2: Upcoming OTT releases to watch this weekendThis weekend, OTT platforms are buzzing with new releases. From Chhaava to Doctor Who, there's something for every viewer.

Gauahar Khan announces second pregnancy with husband Zaid DarbarPopular TV actor Gauahar Khan announced her second pregnancy with husband Zaid Darbar. The couple shared a joint post on Thursday to share the good news.

Good Bad Ugly review: Ajith's film struggles to balance homage and storytellingReleased-Thu Apr 10, 2025Good Bad Ugly movie review: Director Adhik Ravichandran's 'Good Bad Ugly', starring Ajith Kumar, Arjun Das and Trisha, is an action drama. The film is indeed a fan service to Ajith from the filmmaker, but where is the story?

Tom Hiddleston teases about Loki's return to Avengers DoomsdayBritish actor Tom Hiddleston is excited about Avengers: Doomsday. In a recent media interaction, the actor spoke about his return to the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).

Om Puri's first wife recalls actor's affair when she was pregnant: I was shatteredSeema Kapoor opens up about her tumultuous marriage with late actor Om Puri, highlighting his infidelity during her pregnancy and the subsequent breakdown of their relationship. Despite her attempts to save the marriage, the emotional strain and betrayal led to a separation.

Bazooka X reviews: Mammotty's film has 'nothing impressive', fans call it averageMalayalam superstar Mammootty is back on the silver screen with Deeno Dennis's thriller Bazooka. The film received neutral response from fans, with some calling it an average watch, while others engaging.

general news.headline: Tahawwur Rana flight likely to land in Delhi shortly, elite teams on standbyExtradited from the US after an years-long legal battle, Tahawwur Rana is being flown in to Delhi on a special flight. A convoy of bulletproof vehicles will transport him to the National Investigation Agency (NIA) headquarters next.
MS Dhoni to take over as CSK skipper, Ruturaj Gaikwad ruled out of IPL 2025Ruturaj Gaikwad ruled out of IPL 2025, MS Dhoni to take over as CSK skipper

She invited trouble: High Court grants bail to accused in rape caseThe Allahabad High Court said that the rape survivor, being a postgraduate student, was mature and competent enough to understand the morality and significance of her actions.

Tahawwur Rana should be hanged publicly: Brother of 26/11 hero cop Tukaram OmbleEknath Omble, brother of Assistant Sub-Inspector Tukaram Omble who was killed while helping capture terrorist Ajmal Kasab, said Tahawwur Rana should be hanged publicly.

Jaat review: Sunny Deol's film is the mass masala blast we didn't know we neededReleased-Thu Apr 10, 2025Jaat movie review: Sunny Deol's 'Jaat' is an action-packed spectacle that captivates audiences with its high-octane drama and powerful performances, says our review.

Tahawwur Rana extradition LIVE: 26/11 plotter's plane to land at 6:22 pm, say sourcesTahawwur Rana News Live Updates: Tahawwur Hussain Rana, the 26/11 Mumbai terror attack mastermind, is about to land in Delhi on a special plane after he was extradited from the US late on Wednesday. He is likely to be officially arrested by the National Investigation Agency (NIA) and will be lodged at the Tihar jail. The 64-year-old is a Pakistan-born Canadian national and is a close associate of one of the main conspirators of the 2008 Mumbai terror attacks, David Coleman Headley alias Daood Gilani, a US citizen. Follow indiatoday.in for more updates.

Rs 1 lakh power bill to Kangana Ranaut for Manali house? Electricity board reactsThe Himachal Pradesh Electricity Board refuted BJP MP Kangana Ranaut's claim of a Rs 1 lakh monthly power bill, clarifying it included arrears and also noting her Manali home's power load was 1,500 per cent higher than average.

EU pauses countermeasures after Trump's reprieve to give 'negotiations a chance'The European bloc was due to launch counter-tariffs on about 21 billion euros (USD 23.25 billion) of US imports from next Tuesday in response to Trump's 25 per cent tariffs on steel and aluminium.

White House's 'don't retaliate, rewarded' post has X users sharing parenting tipsThe post came amid US President Donald Trump's surprise announcement of a 90-day pause on tariffs for over 75 countries, a dramatic reversal just a day after imposing sweeping new trade duties.

For Tahawwur Rana, a high-security NIA cell, only 'Special 12' have accessTahawwur Rana will be interrogated in a high-security NIA cell, where he will be presented with key evidence related to the 26/11 Mumbai attacks. Access to this special interrogation cell will be restricted to just 12 officers from the investigating agency.

US asking Indian students to self-deport. Here's what they can doMany Indians are among the scores of international students in American colleges and universities who have received an email stating that their visas have been revoked. Experts suggest self-deportation should be the last option. Amid fear of deportation, here's the legal recourse that students can take.

How a 26/11 hero is leading fight against Tahawwur RanaIndia is bringing back 26/11 terror plotter Tahawwur Rana to face justice in the country. Leading the fight is none other than 26/11 hero Sadanand Date, who fought terrorists, including Ajmal Kasab, and was severely injured. Date is now the NIA chief. The NIA, formed after the 2008 Mumbai attacks, is at the forefront of getting Rana prosecuted.
Looking for a car between Rs 10 lakh and Rs 20 lakh? Consider these top modelsBuyers have access to models across multiple segments in the price bracket of Rs 10 lakh to Rs 20 lakh (ex-showroom).

US's 'bad actors' jibe at China, says India in front on trade negotiationsSingling out China, which has been hit with a 125% tariff, the US treasury secretary said such countries were contributing to imbalances in the global economy.

Doors open for talks, but blackmail won't work: China after Trump's 125% tariffsAmid an escalating tariff war, Beijing said that "pressure, threats, and blackmail are not the right way to deal with China", and warned that if Washington "insists on its own way, China will follow through to the end".

How a farmer's daughter from Jharkhand made it to Harvard with a full scholarshipA young footballer from rural Jharkhand has earned a full Harvard scholarship, overcoming poverty and breaking gender barriers to reach the world's most prestigious university. Here's more about her journey.

Sunny Deol and the art of reinventing the angry man stereotypeSunny Deol is all set to bring back his signature same-same-but-somehow-different angry man energy in Gopichand Mallineni's Jaat. But seriously—how does he pull this off every single time? Why do audiences still root for him, cheer for him, and turn up in droves for characters that, on paper, feel almost identical? What is it about Sunny that keeps him so relevant, even when he's playing yet another rage-fuelled desi hero?

Project Shield: India Today launches nationwide awareness campaign against digital fraudJust last year, Indians lost nearly Rs 23,000 crore to fraudsters. Over 20 lakh people are being defrauded every year.

Mumbai's Jal Vayu Vihar, Kumbh Mela were also in Tahawwur Rana's crosshairsSpeaking to India Today TV, Loknath Behera, former Inspector General of the National Investigation Agency (NIA), revealed that Rana had plans to target the Kumbh Mela in Haridwar and had carried out reconnaissance at the Pushkar Mela in Rajasthan.

Menstruating Class 8 student in Tamil Nadu made to take exam outside classroomA Class 8 student in Coimbatore was allegedly made to take her Science exam outside the classroom during her menstrual cycle. A viral video shows her mother questioning the school and blaming the Principal.

Justin Bieber snaps at 'disrespectful' paps in viral clip: Not caring about humansA video going viral online shows singer Justin Bieber losing his cool with the paparazzi, labelling them 'money-hungry' and disrespectful. He further criticised them for showing no regard for basic human decency.

When Tahawwur Rana visited Taj Mahal, Mumbai with wife ahead of 26/11 attacksTahawwur Rana, the Canadian national accused of providing logistical support to David Coleman Headley, who surveyed targets in Mumbai, was extradited to India.

He's Canadian: Pak distances itself from Tahawwur Rana after extradition to IndiaIn its first response following the extradition of 26/11 Mumbai terror attacks plotter Tahawwur Rana from the US to India, Pakistan has hastily distanced itself from the terror accused, saying that he is no longer a Pakistani citizen.

1,000 days of periods: Rare medical condition in US woman shock doctorsDespite undergoing multiple tests, treatments, and even surgical procedures, no one could initially explain the cause of her prolonged bleeding.

sports.headline: Ruturaj Gaikwad ruled out of IPL 2025, MS Dhoni to take over as CSK skipperRuturaj Gaikwad ruled out of IPL 2025, MS Dhoni to take over as CSK skipper

RCB comes up with unique initiative to teach fans Kannada using JalebiRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) have come up with a new initiative to teach their fans Kannada through the use of sweet dish Jalebi.

PSL 2025: Squads, schedule, and all you need to knowPakistan Super League 2025: Shadab Khan's Islamabad United and Shaheen Shah Afridi's Lahore Qalandars will face off in the opening match of the tournament on Friday, April 11. 34 matches will take place in the competition with the final on May 18.

Pulling out of IPL wasn't easy, but was right decision: England captain Harry BrookEngland's new white-ball captain Harry Brook said that while skipping the IPL wasn't an easy decision for him, it was the right call in the end. Brook became the first player to be banned from IPL for three years under the new rule.

PSL: Timings of Pakistan Super League matches changed to avoid clash with IPLPSL 2025: In a bid to avoid direct airtime clash with the Indian Premier League, Pakistan Super League matches in the evening will get underway an hour later than usual. The PSL and the IPL are being held in the same window for the first time.

LSG coach Justin Langer slams IPL mega auction rule: It is bizarreJustin Langer has slammed the IPL mega-auction rule, calling it bizarre and something he hasn't seen in any other sport so far. The IPL mega-auction takes place every three years as teams can only retain up to six players.

Cristiano Ronaldo launches film studio with Kingsman director VaughnCristiano Ronaldo teams up with Kingsman director Matthew Vaughn to launch UR•Marv, a new film studio merging football star power with Hollywood creativity. The move marks Ronaldo's biggest step yet into the world of cinema and global entertainment.

PBKS owner Preity Zinta sends heartfelt message to Priyansh Arya: His talent spokePunjab Kings owner Preity Zinta sent a heartfelt message to Priyansh Arya after his impressive knock of 103 off 42 balls against Chennai Super Kings. Priyansh broke many records as Punjab secured their third win of the season.

PV Sindhu continues to struggle, crashes out in 2nd round of Asian ChampionshipsBadminton Asia Championships 2025: PV Sindhu, ranked 17, lost to third seed Akane Yamaguchi of Japan in the second round on Thursday. The two-time Olympics medallist has endured a poor run in the 2025 season.

RCB vs DC LIVE: KL Rahul vs Virat Kohli in Bengaluru battleIPL 2025, Royal Challengers Bengaluru vs Delhi Capitals live score and updates from Bengaluru: An unbeaten Delhi side will look to make it four in four when they take on Bengaluru. RCB have won three in four games, but their only loss came at home. Can they find a formula to overcome their familiar problems at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium?

Portugal's 64-year-old Joanna Child becomes second oldest T20I debutantJoanna Child, at 64, became the second-oldest cricketer to debut in a T20I. Despite limited impact on the scoresheet, her selection and spirit stood out in Portugal's series win, earning admiration across the cricketing world.

I will always be a Thala fan: Ambati Rayudu slams trolls over MS Dhoni commentsIPL 2025: Ambati Rayudu lashed out at criticism of his comments about MS Dhoni. In a strongly-worded post on social media, the former CSK batter hit out at trolls, saying he will continue to be a fan of 'Thala'.

R Ashwin on CSK criticism: Not bothered by trolls, real fans stand by playersIPL 2025: Senior off-spinner R Ashwin said he is open to constructive criticism following intense scrutiny over his slow start to the new season. AShwin has taken 5 wickets in five matches and conceded at over 9 runs per over on his return to CSK.

Prince William channels inner Villa fan with punditry before PSG defeatPrince William's detailed analysis of Aston Villa ahead of their defeat to PSG has gone viral, with football fans praising his tactical breakdown and deep knowledge of the game. The royal was in attendance at the Parc des Princes for the Champions League clash.

Virat Kohli on IPL's most buzzing rivalry: Nothing Like CSK vs RCB in BengaluruIPL 2025: Virat Kohli said the buzz during Chennai Super Kings' visit to Bengaluru at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium is unmatched and adds to the theatre around the contest. RCB hammered CSK by 50 runs earlier in the season in Chennai.

Luis Enrique hails Kvaratskhelia key to PSG project after Villa heroicsLuis Enrique praised Khvicha Kvaratskhelia's match-winning display against Aston Villa, calling him a vital piece of PSG's future. The Georgian winger's impact has already been felt since his January move, helping the Parisians take a strong lead into the second leg.

Chinnaswamy Stadium on Thursday. Two explosive sides are set for a cracking contest—one that could well be decided by the finest of margin.

Barcelona have not qualified yet: Flick urges caution despite Dortmund winBarcelona head coach Hansi Flick urged caution after his side's 4-0 win over Borussia Dortmund, warning that the Champions League quarter-final tie isn't over yet. Flick stressed the need for complete focus ahead of the return leg in Germany.

Had to drag Sudharsan out of nets: GT coach Parthiv praises opener's work ethicsGujarat Titans assistant coach Parthiv Patel has praised Sai Sudharsan's superb run with the bat in the ongoing Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025. LA Olympics 2028: Cricket to feature 6 teams, 90 players on Games returnCricket will return to the Olympic Games for the first time since 1900. Six men's teams and as many women's teams will be part of the Games in Los Angeles in 2028.

GT vs RR: Sai Sudharsan goes past Gayle, Williamson in elite IPL listSai Sudharsan's brilliant 82 against Rajasthan Royals not only powered Gujarat Titans to a commanding win but also took him past IPL greats like Chris Gayle and Kane Williamson on the elite run-scorers list after 30 innings.

Why no Washington Sundar for GT vs RR: Parthiv Patel explains bold callGT batting coach Parthiv Patel has explained the reason why Washington Sundar wasn't part of the playing XI for their win over RR on April 9. Sundar's omission didn't sit well with a lot of fans.

Ashish Nehra's guidance has done a world of good to Siraj and Prasidh: Robin UthappaFormer India cricketer turned commentator Robin Uthappa has credited Gujarat Titans (GT) coach Ashish Nehra for helping Mohammed Siraj and Prasidh Krishna return to form in the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Sanju Samson fined for RR's slow over rate, joins penalised captains listSanju Samson was hit with a Rs 24 lakh fine for a slow over rate against Gujarat Titans, adding to Rajasthan Royals' early-season troubles as the team finds itself mid-table after a shaky 2-3 start in IPL 2025.

Robin Uthappa slams Rajasthan Royals for releasing Jos Buttler for mega auctionFormer India cricketer turned commentator Robin Uthappa has slammed Rajasthan Royals (RR) for letting go of Jos Buttler ahead of the mega auction for the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

RR lacked partnerships vs GT, want to win games chasing: Spin bowling coachRajasthan Royals suffered a heavy defeat at the hands of Gujarat Titans, with coach Sairaj Bahutule calling for sharper batting partnerships and adaptability. RR's inability to chase down 218 now poses key questions for their middle-order consistency.

IPL 2025: GT's Sudharsan shows he is ready to be India's next all-format starWith maturity beyond his age, Sai Sudharsan is showing that he has all the tools needed to be India's next all-format star in the coming years. The TN batter has been in fine form for GT this season and is continuing to make fans with his smart gameplay.

Badminton Asia Championship: Sindhu reaches 2nd round with straight-sets winIndia's PV Sindhu made it to the second round of the Badminton Asia Championship on Wednesday, April 9. Sindhu defeated Ester Wardoyo of Indonesia in straight sets to make it to the next round.

Djokovic crashes out of Monte Carlo masters after 2nd straight loss to TabiloNovak Djokovic crashed out of the Monte Carlo Masters following a 3-6, 4-6 loss against unseeded Alejandro Tabilo in the second round on Wednesday. Following his win, Tabilo maintained a remarkable 100% win record over Djokovic.

GT vs RR: Rajasthan skipper Samson defends decision to bowl first in AhmedabadRajasthan Royals skipper Sanju Samson defended the decision to bowl first in Ahmedabad after their loss to Gujarat Titans on Wednesday, April 9. RR lost their third game in the IPL 2025 season.

IPL 2025 GT vs RR: All-round Gujarat Titans hammer Rajasthan Royals to top tableGujarat Titans (GT) continued their winning run in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025), beating Rajasthan Royals (RR) by 58 runs at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. Sai Sudharsan was the star of the show with his magnificent innings of 82 (53) while Prasidh Krishna emerged as the pick of the bowlers.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
